cab.content: ^td&m c r e t.BATTLE SITUATIOII - NOON - 30th JUNE, 1918.1 * WESTERN FRONT.There is no change in the general situation in the British and French Sec tors *A hostile attack against a post in the neighbourhood of MERRIS this morning was repulsed,1Considerable hostile artillery activity was developed early this morning against the new positions East of NIEPPE FOREST and ' during'the night in the ALBERT sector, North of the SCARPE and near FESTUBERT.2 * ITALIAN FRONT.Local operations are In progress to recover positions on the S.E. of the ASIAGO plateau from which the Italians were forced back on June 15th, Some progress has been made especially on MONTE VAL BELLA and so far over 800 prisoners have been taken. Otherwise there is nothing to report.I General Staff,War Office, S.W.I. 30th June, 1918.Issued at .12,30 P.m.
